message: Mink takes me back to the room I woke up in.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Let go!"
Once we're inside, I shake his hand off.
Mink moves away from me and takes a seat on the bed, staring at me with his unreadable eyes.
I'm more than a little intimidated, but I meet his stare with a scowl.
This is the kind of man who can strike without warning, without a hint of his intentions showing on his face.
He has an almost eerie calm. When he looks at you, it's like he can see exactly who you are and what you're thinking.
Like a predator staring down prey.
That's why I know I can't show any weakness, even if that means bluffing.

name: 蒼葉
message: "What are you after? Why'd you bring me here? Where's Granny?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Why'd you bash that guy's face in? He was just following your orders like the others, wasn't he? So why'd you do it?"

name: ミンク
message: "No, not him. No one was supposed to enter your room."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Not him? You think I care? What do you want? To watch me get raped?"

name: ミンク
message: "...You need to learn what you are."

name: ミンク
message: "I'll say it one more time: that man was not acting on my orders. He did that all on his own."

name: ミンク
message: "Because your voice enthralled him."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...My voice?"
I resist the urge to ask what he means.
It's true. That man was obsessed with my voice.
But how does Mink know that?

name: ミンク
message: "Ultimately, why he did it doesn't matter. He disobeyed my orders, and I can't let that go. Rules are rules."
Now I'm even more confused.

name: 蒼葉
message: "How do you know about my voice?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Answer me. And tell me what happened to Granny, too."

name: ミンク
message: "I don't know. You were my only objective."

name: 蒼葉
message: "What?"
Then what about Granny?
While I'm struggling to wrap my head around this, Mink pulls something from his coat pocket and shows it to me.

name: ミンク
message: "What is this?"
It's my headache medicine!
I reach for it, but he pulls away.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Give it to me!"

name: ミンク
message: "Answer the question."

name: 蒼葉
message: "It's just headache medicine."

name: ミンク
message: "This isn't something you buy in a drugstore."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Granny's a doctor. I don't know anything else about it."

name: ミンク
message: "You're like a junkie."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Huh?"
Mink tucks the medicine back into his coat and gets up off the bed.
He opens the door and speaks a few words to someone in the hall.
A few moments later, two men enter the room, dragging something behind them.
They drop their cargo in the middle of the room and leave.
The cargo... is people.
Two men, dressed in black, are lying face down on the floor.
Looking closely, I can tell they're still breathing.

name: ミンク
message: "Look at their necks."
Necks?
I lean forward.
Morphine's tag.
And that's not all. Each has a black square beneath the wings and halo. Another tag was blacked out.
I can still see part of the original pattern.
Unless I'm mistaken, that's...

name: 蒼葉
message: "Dry Juice..."
I lift one of the men by the shoulder to get a look at his face.
...I know him. He's a member of Dry Juice.

name: ミンク
message: "They were in your house before we got there. Most of them had already gone by the time we arrived. They were the last two left."

name: ミンク
message: "You get it now? We had nothing to do with your grandmother."

name: 蒼葉
message: "But... then what happened to her?"

name: ミンク
message: "I don't know, but we did track down the others who were there."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Really? Then―"

name: ミンク
message: "First, we need to come to an agreement. Like I said, you're my objective."

name: ミンク
message: "I brought you here to confirm my suspicions. I got the answers I needed."

name: ミンク
message: "Now, you're going to do whatever I tell you. And in return, I'll help you with your little problem."

name: 蒼葉
message: "What problem?"

name: ミンク
message: "I'll help you find your grandmother."
How am I supposed to believe that?
For all I know, this might be some kind of sick game. He already put me through hell once before.
Although... that doesn't explain what happened to the Dry Juice guys.
Blacking out the Dry Juice tags and putting Morphine's over the top... That's not something he could've put together this quickly, right?

name: ミンク
message: "If you don't believe me, you can look for her yourself. It's up to you."
I hate to admit it, but I don't think I can find her on my own.
If Morphine really was involved, I wouldn't even know where to start.

name: 蒼葉
message: "You said I was your goal. What exactly do you want me for?"

name: ミンク
message: "You don't need to know that right now. What you need is to decide if you're on board or not."
